title: Whitman Mission National Historic Site: Attack on the Mission 1847
body: Attack on the Mission 1847       The Attack 1847 - Short Version Attack on the Mission - More Detailed Version Chapter 22 of Clifford Drury's book, Marcus and Narcissa Whitman and the Opening of Old Oregon, provides a detailed description. Catherine Sager's account of the attack Catherine was 13 years old when the mission was attacked. Years later she wrote about her experience. Accounts of the Attack and Period of Captivity A list compiled by historian Clifford Drury. Lists of those killed, escaped, and held captive. Living Arrangements - Fall 1847 Over 70 people were staying with the Whitmans. Where were they all put?
